articles.author: Eli Stokols
articles.title: Trump will appoint personnel chief Sergio Gor as ambassador to India - Politico
articles.description: The 38-year-old head of the personnel office endeared himself to Trump by demanding loyalty in hiring.
articles.content: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, left, and Presidential Personnel Office Director Sergio Gor, arrives on Marine One with President Donald Trump at the White House, Sunday, April 6, 2025, in Washingt… [+772 chars]
